name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Proficient Backend Engineer with extensive expertise in **Node.js**, **AWS**, **Azure**, **SQL**, and **NoSQL** for building robust backend systems. Skilled in designing microservices, REST APIs, and implementing **performance tuning** strategies for scalable applications. Experienced in **AI coding assistants** and **NLP**, with a strong foundation in **CQRS** and **distributed processing techniques**. Adept at building **ML infrastructure** and executing effective **data engineering** tasks. Recognized for delivering high-quality solutions across various sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, enhancing system performance through automation and optimized architecture. Committed to continuous learning and adept in using **documentation tools** and **architecture diagrams** to support clear communication and collaboration within engineering teams. Problem-solving is a core strength, complemented by a drive for efficient and clean code.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented **microservices** architecture for a Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS) using **Node.js**, achieving 95% accuracy in patient tracking and improving adherence rates through AI-driven automated reminders.
Developed efficient **REST APIs** that enhance data accuracy by 40% and ensure secure EHR integration through **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases.
Utilized performance tuning methodologies to optimize system response times by 30% while enhancing user experience in the interface.
Integrated **distributed processing techniques** to build a real-time notification system that achieved 99% timely alerts delivery.
Designed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using **AWS** and **Azure**, resulting in an 80% reduction in deployment times.
Implemented **documentation tools** and architecture diagrams to ensure clear communication and knowledge sharing within the team, promoting continuous learning.
Managed the deployment of services on **AWS** utilizing container orchestration with **Kubernetes**, ensuring 99.9% uptime and effective load handling with **Redis** caching.

Built and optimized **microservices** using **Node.js** and **Java (Spring Boot)**, achieving a **25%** reduction in response times for ticketing and customer support.
Implemented distributed processing techniques with **Kafka** to design a notification system for real-time alerts, resulting in a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
Engineered data solutions using **NoSQL** and **SQL** databases for a customer insights dashboard with **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, boosting resolution rates by **20%**.
Utilized **AWS** services such as **AWS EC2** and **AWS CodePipeline** to automate testing and deployment, ensuring a streamlined release process.
Deployed containerized applications with **Docker** and **Terraform**, which reduced infrastructure setup time by **50%** and enhanced scalability.

• Developed resilient **REST APIs** using **Node.js**, leading to a performance improvement of 30% in response times.
• Engaged with various database technologies, implementing **SQL** and **NoSQL** solutions for optimized data storage, achieving a **99%** data retrieval success rate.
• Spearheaded microservices architecture to enhance modularity and scalability of applications, successfully managing over **5** services.
• Utilized **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services for seamless deployment, resulting in a reduction of infrastructure costs by **20%**.
• Employed continuous learning to stay updated with emerging technologies such as AI coding assistants and **NLP**, integrating them into workflows to boost productivity.
• Conducted performance tuning and optimization strategies, reducing system latency by **25%** in distributed processing environments.
• Developed thorough documentation using specialized tools and created architecture diagrams to streamline team collaboration and understanding.
• Leveraged data engineering techniques to handle large datasets, processing over **500GB** of data efficiently.
• Applied **CQRS** strategies to optimize read and write operations, enhancing application efficiency through clear separation of concerns.

skills:
Programming Languages: Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

	Backend Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

	Frontend Frameworks: React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

	API Technologies: REST APIs

	Serverless and Cloud Functions: AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway

	Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB, NoSQL

	DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

	Cloud & Infrastructure: AWS, Azure, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

	Other: Microservices, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, performance tuning, distributed processing techniques, documentation tools, architecture diagrams, data engineering, AI coding assistants, NLP, problem-solving, continuous learning
